Package project

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AiPlayer
    this is Ai player class it use a simple algorithm to compute best coordinate it is inherited Player class
    GameSystem
    this is game System class it use to handle game System we can create new game with create new object of this class it has game players and game map
    Main
    this is a simple othello game whit java this is Main class if user select 1 play with computer else play with another user
    Map
    Map class any object of this class is a game board
    Nut
    this is Nut class game map is array of this class
    Player
    the player class it use to save player details color = -1 for blank nuts, 0 for white and 1 for black nuts
